item.title: Jira DC Geocaching Without Public CDN
item.description: Atlassian recently introduced Content Delivery Networks (CDN) support to their products, namely Jira from version 8.3 onwards. This support includes common CDNs like AWS CloudFront, Cloudflare, Akamai, and others1. However, there is no clear documentation on how to use the feature using self-hosted cache servers instead of a publicly available CDN. In this article, we go through the procedure of implementing Jira cache servers in other geographic locations and enabling them in Jira using the CDN feature.
